regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user upon successful completion of validation tasks.

regen.absent_element: action upon highlighted errors in the data review process
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide options for users to save, rectify, or notify about errors identified during the data review process.

regen.absent_element: action of logging validation rule changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall maintain an audit log of all modifications to validation rules.

label: Configuring data validation rules shall be a privileged operation.
absence: action of granting privilege to configuring data validation rules
